para: The following destination drivers can use disk-based buffering: amqp(), elasticsearch2(), file(), hdfs(), http(), kafka(), mongodb(), program(), redis(), riemann(), smtp(), snmp(), sql(), stomp(), unix-dgram(), and unix-stream(). The network(), syslog(), tcp(), and tcp6() destination drivers can also use disk-based buffering, except when using the udp transport method. (The other destinations or protocols do not provide the necessary feedback mechanisms required for disk-based buffering.)
